@graph.name: Advanced Team Management - Fleet Organization Tools for Logistics Operations - Route4Me
@graph.description: Build an interactive, hierarchically structured team network with customizable roles and permissions. Optimize workload distribution and enable seamless collaboration across your last-mile logistics operations.
@graph.keywords: team management, fleet organization, permissions hierarchy, logistics operations, route planning teams, driver management, dispatch collaboration, mobile workforce management, team hierarchy, branch management, workforce visibility, real-time team collaboration, user access control, role-based permissions

@graph.name: Advanced Team Management for Route Planning
@graph.description: Route4Me's Advanced Team Management allows you to build an interactive and hierarchically structured network of users with internal company roles and adjustable access permissions. Create branch managers for different divisions with separate teams of drivers, planners, and analysts. Control what team members can see and edit through different access levels to centralized data. Enable real-time collaboration through data synchronization across platforms while managing your team from anywhere.

@graph.name: Get Advanced Team Management
@graph.description: Add the Advanced Team Management feature to your Route4Me subscription

@graph.name: Team Structure Features
@graph.value: Hierarchical team organization, flexible roles, branch management, permissions-based hierarchy

@graph.name: Access Control Capabilities
@graph.value: Account-level permissions, read-only mode, selective data visibility, centralized data access

@graph.name: Team Collaboration
@graph.value: Real-time data synchronization, cross-platform access, mobile team management

@graph.name: Workforce Management
@graph.value: Auto-assign features, workload distribution, team network management

itemListElement.name: Structure your entire workforce using flexible roles within a permissions-based hierarchy
Create separate accounts with specific roles and permissions for each team member
Control data visibility and edit access for each team member across your organization
Configure access settings for team members, vehicles, and routes with Read-Only Mode
Dispatch routes and collaborate with your team in near real-time with instant data synchronization
Manage your entire team network from your smartphone when on the go
Optimize workload distribution with auto-assign features for routes, drivers, and vehicles
Invite hundreds of team members at once and allow them to complete their own account details
